items.name: Black Sands
items.summary: Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut
items.desc:
Black Sands - Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut
Blacks Sands is a pitch black Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut. It delivers initial flavours of cinnamon which then blends with the coconut, developing into a candied sweetness from the lactose and vanilla, with underlying notes of chocolate.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Lactose, Hops, Yeast, Ceylon Cinnamon, Toasted Coconut Flakes, Cacoa Nibs, Vanilla, Fenugreek
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Lutra Lutra
items.desc:
Lutra Lutra - Pale Ale
Lutra Lutra is a straight forward easy drinking pale ale. A nice simple malt based combined with a modest level of hops to create a no fuss, quaffable, slightly hazy, pale ale.
5.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Maple Dream
items.desc:
Maple Dream - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout
Maple Dream is a progression on the base ideas used in a previous gluten-free, lactose-free Imperial Sweet Stout that we brewed back in November 19, Leap. With some recipe adaptations and additions, this time we have created a Maple Imperial Stout which is still gluten-free and lactose-free, accessible to coeliacs, people with lactose and other gluten intolerance's, vegans and people who enjoy a good ol' Imperial Stout.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm
Vegan friendly

items.name: Mini City Of Gold
items.desc:
Mini City Of Gold - Table Beer
Mini City of Gold is a highly sessionable version of our 5% milkshake IPA 'City Of Gold'. A creamy 3% base beer is charged with El Dorado and Azacca hops before being infused with vanilla. A beer full of flavour and low on alcohol, perfect for the summer.
3.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Mixed 12 pack
items.desc:
Mixed 12 pack
Case contains 12x 440ml cans:
Black Sands - Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats - Vegitarian friendly
Blacks Sands is a pitch black Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut. It delivers initial flavours of cinnamon which then blends with the coconut, developing into a candied sweetness from the lactose and vanilla, with underlying notes of chocolate.
Maple Dream - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm - Vegan friendly
Maple Dream is a progression on the base ideas used in a previous gluten-free, lactose-free Imperial Sweet Stout that we brewed back in November 19, Leap. With some recipe adaptations and additions, this time we have created a Maple Imperial Stout which is still gluten-free and lactose-free, accessible to coeliacs, people with lactose and other gluten intolerance's, vegans and people who enjoy a good ol' Imperial Stout.
Raspberry Crash - Raspberry Imperial Stout - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats - Vegan friendly
We do enjoy brewing fruited Imperial Stouts here at Wander Beyond. Raspberry Crash is a chewy Imperial Stout we re-fermented on 200g/L of raspberries before infusing it with vanilla and cacao nibs.
Flavours of rich chocolate and subtle roasted malt notes are combined with the ripeness from the raspberries to create this deviously delicious stout.
Mini City Of Gold - Table Beer - x1
3.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
Mini City of Gold is a highly sessionable version of our 5% milkshake IPA 'City Of Gold'. A creamy 3% base beer is charged with El Dorado and Azacca hops before being infused with vanilla. A beer full of flavour and low on alcohol, perfect for the summer.
Gasp - Milkshake IPA with Peach and Apricot - x1
7.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
The name Gasp is a nod back to a similar brew of ours that you may remember, Gulp.
Gasp is a deliciously fruited Milkshake IPA. Fermented on 200g/l of peaches and apricots. The sweetness from the fruits and lactose is balanced against a backdrop of citrus notes, provided by the Chinook dry hop. This is a refreshing yet moreish little number.
Octo-pie - Passionfruit Imperial Milkshake IPA - x1
9.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
Octo-pie is an Imperial passion fruit Milkshake IPA. Overloaded with half a tonne of tart and tangy passion fruit and infused with vanilla and creamy lactose, this is a refreshingly sharp yet indulgent dessert-like treat.
Sleepy Hollow - IPA - x4
7.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Wheat, Oats - Vegan friendly
For an IPA, Sleepy Hollow has a medium to thick body, which carries forward citrus flavours of sweet orange and pink grapefruit. These are backed up with tropical notes of mango and pineapple, with a slight dankness and a moderately bitter finish.
As for the artwork, the can pictures the hops Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe, climbing an enchanting boulder problem in the North Yorkshire Moors called 'Sleepy Hollow'. The picturesque boulder hides in the forest with a tree emerging from within it. The iconic line traverses a sloping block with big slaps and technical footwork (for those who climb, it's pretty tough and graded 7c+ from a sit).
Pursuit - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Imperial Milkshake IPA - x2
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm - Vegan friendly
Pursuit is a gluten and lactose free version of one of our favourite beers to brew, Illicium. We believe we have successfully managed to create a doppelganger in Pursuit, which despite the lack of lactose still delivers on the sweet smoothness of itâ€™s older sibling. Balanced with the punchy fruit flavours of the Citra and Mosaic hops to create a sweet dessert style Imperial Milkshake IPA, Pursuit is accessible to coeliacs, people with other gluten and lactose intolerance's and vegans.

items.name: Octo-pie
items.desc:
Octo-Pie - Passionfruit Imperial Milkshake IPA
Octopie is an imperial passion fruit milkshake IPA. Overloaded with half a tonne of tart and tangy passion fruit and infused with vanilla and creamy lactose, this is a refreshingly sharp yet indulgent dessert-like treat.
9.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Ozzy
items.summary: Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
items.desc:
Ozzy - Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
Ozzy pours pitch black with a tan head, giving off aromas of tonka beans and star anise. Upon your first mouthful you are met with big upfront hits of liquorice and aniseed, which then fades into notes of dark chocolate and vanilla. Ozzy has a smooth and soft level of carbonation which is accompanied on the way down by a hint of heat making sure you donâ€™t forget itâ€™s 11.0%. As you continue to drink Ozzy it becomes more and more morish.
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Hops, Yeast, Tonka Beans, Star Anise, Vanilla and Cacao Nibs
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Peak
items.desc:
Peak - Pale Ale
This beer normally doesn't travel much further than Manchester as it is primarily brewed for cask. However we're excited to release this can version for you to enjoy both in Manchester or further afield.
3.8% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Pursuit
items.desc:
Pursuit - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Imperial Milkshake IPA
Pursuit is a gluten and lactose free version of one of our favourite beers to brew, Illicium. We believe we have successfully managed to create a doppelganger in Pursuit, which despite the lack of lactose still delivers on the sweet smoothness of itâ€™s older sibling. Balanced with the punchy fruit flavours of the Citra and Mosaic hops to create a sweet dessert style Imperial Milkshake IPA, Pursuit is accessible to coeliac, people with other gluten and lactose intolerance's and vegans.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm
Vegan friendly

items.name: Ramble
items.desc:
Ramble - Session Pale Ale
Ramble is a light sessionable pale ale coming in at 4.2% ABV. A light malt character balanced with a subtle dry hop ensures the sessionable drinkability of this pale ale.
4.2% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Raspberry Crash
items.desc:
Raspberry Crash - Raspberry Imperial Stout
We do enjoy brewing fruited Imperial Stouts here at Wander Beyond. Raspberry Crash is a chewy Imperial Stout we re-fermented on 200g/L of raspberries before infusing it with vanilla and cacao nibs.
Flavours of rich chocolate and subtle roasted malt notes are combined with the ripeness from the raspberries to create this deviously delicious stout.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats
Vegan friendly

items.name: Storm Kats
items.desc:
Storm Kats - Imperial Porter
Brewed with our friends at Kees brewery in the Netherlands, Storm Kats is a straight imperial porter. Brewed with eight different malts and added honey, Storm Kats has rounded flavours of chocolate, honey, sweet toffee and light coffee notes.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats
Vegan Friendly
